description: Deploy an AutoGPT Telegram bot on Steamship.

bot_token.description: The secret token for your Telegram bot

max_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens that should be returned by the LLM for each call. This controls the length of the text responses.

max_iterations.description: Maximum number of steps AutoGPT should take before stopping. Must be between 0 and 10 (0 is interpreted to mean to run without limits).

steamshipRegistry.tagline: Create your own Telegram Buddy running AutoGPT with Langchain and Steamship.
